com.adamtaft.eb
Class EventBusFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.adamtaft.eb.EventBusFactory
Deprecated. Favor using the EventBusService instead. 

@Deprecated
public class EventBusFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory for creating instances of EventBus. The most common use case will be to call getEventBus(), which returns a BasicEventBus singleton instance. Other EventBus implementations can, however, be created and used easily with this factory.

Author:
Adam Taft

Method Detail

newEventBus

public static EventBus newEventBus(java.lang.Class<? extends EventBus> eventBusClass)
                            throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                   java.lang.IllegalAccessException
Deprecated. 
Creates and returns an EventBus instances as specified by the provided event bus class. Uses Class.newInstance() to create the new instance of the event bus.

Parameters:
eventBusClass - The class used to create the event bus instance.
Returns:
The specified EventBus
Throws:
java.lang.InstantiationException
java.lang.IllegalAccessException

newEventBus

public static EventBus newEventBus(java.lang.String eventBusClassName)
                            throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                   java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                   java.lang.IllegalAccessException
Deprecated. 
Creates and returns an EventBus instance based on the specified class name. This will create the bus using the Class.forName(String) method.

Parameters:
eventBusClassName - The fully qualified class name.
Returns:
An instance of the specified EventBus class.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
java.lang.InstantiationException
java.lang.IllegalAccessException

newEventBus

public static EventBus newEventBus()
Deprecated. 
Creates and returns a new BasicEventBus. This would not usually be very useful unless separate EventBus instances were needed (for a more complex application or something).

Returns:
A new instance of BasicEventBus

getEventBus

public static EventBus getEventBus()
Deprecated. 
Creates (if necessary) and returns a singleton instance of a BasicEventBus. This will likely be the most common use case for most applications.

Returns:
A singleton instance of BasicEventBus
